noun.description: A member of a North American Indian people formerly inhabiting north-western Florida.
The Muskogean language of the Mikasuki.

adjective.description: Of, relating, or belonging to the Mikasuki or their language.

origin: Late 18th century; earliest use found in American State Papers, Indian Affairs. From the name of a former town in the Creek Confederacy, hence probably from Creek, but form and etymology unknown.
